    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int askCards​(java.util.List<GodCardProxy> cards)
    This method asks to user to chose a card to use in this match
    int askConfirmation​(CommunicationProtocol key)
    This method asks confirmation to player It could ask if player wants to use his power It could ask if player wants to undo his turn
    private void askConnection()
    This method creates all the form about connection
    int[] askDeck​(java.util.List<GodCardProxy> cards)
    This method asks cards of the match to challenger
    java.lang.String askIp()
    This method asks ip to user If the user had already connected to server and wants to play a new match, this method returns saved ip without asking it to user again
    int askMatchType()
    This method asks match type to user
    int askPort()
    This method asks port to user If the user had already connected to server and wants to play a new match, this method returns saved port without asking it to user again
    int askPosition​(java.util.List<int[]> positions)
    This method asks a box from a given list.
    java.lang.String askUserName​(CommunicationProtocol key)
    This method asks username to user If the user had already connected to server and wants to play a new match, this method returns saved username without asking it to user again, if key is USERNAME If the user is in the setting window the method calls prepareToStart If the user clicks on disconnect, this method doesn't ask username and returns null
    int askWorker​(java.util.List<int[]> workers)
    This method asks worker to move in current turn

    • setGameIsReady

      private void setGameIsReady()
      This method notifies gameIsReady when menu scene is ready and displayed. Server is asking for username and this variable waits for menu scene to be ready to ask the username

    • setReadyForTheMatch

      private void setReadyForTheMatch()
      This method notifies readyForTheMatch when match scene is ready and displayed. Server will ask cards to challenger and this variable waits for match scene to be ready to ask cards to challenger

    • prepareToStart

      public void prepareToStart()
      This method is called when user has connected to server. It shows disconnection button and play button. Firstly it wait for user choice, then, if user chooses to play, waits for menu scene to be ready and displayed

    • startMatch

      public void startMatch()
      This method starts the match and shows match scene It waits for the match scene to be ready and then returns

    • askIp

      public java.lang.String askIp()
      This method asks ip to user If the user had already connected to server and wants to play a new match, this method returns saved ip without asking it to user again

      Specified by:
      askPort in interface View
      Returns:

    • askUserName

      public java.lang.String askUserName​(CommunicationProtocol key)
      This method asks username to user If the user had already connected to server and wants to play a new match, this method returns saved username without asking it to user again, if key is USERNAME If the user is in the setting window the method calls prepareToStart If the user clicks on disconnect, this method doesn't ask username and returns null
      Specified by:
      askUserName in interface View
      Parameters:
      key - Key that could be USERNAME or UNIQUE_USERNAME
      Returns:
      Username

    • askMatchType

      This method asks match type to user
      Specified by:
      askMatchType in interface View
      Returns:
      Match type

    • askPosition

      public int askPosition​(java.util.List<int[]> positions) throws TimeOutException
      This method asks a box from a given list. It is called for choosing workers starting position, worker for the current turn, destination of a move, a build or a remove
      Specified by:
      askPosition in interface View
      Parameters:
      positions - List of possible boxes
      Returns:
      Chosen box
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out

      This method asks cards of the match to challenger
      Specified by:
      askDeck in interface View
      Parameters:
      cards - List of all cards of the game
      Returns:
      Chosen cards indexes
      Throws:
      TimeOutException - Exception thrown when the time to do an action runs out

      public int askConfirmation​(CommunicationProtocol key) throws TimeOutException

      Specified by:
      askConfirmation in interface View
      Parameters:
      key - Key that tells which is the request for the player
      Returns:
